trans-unit.source: Add an Azure blob destination to receive purchase order
trans-unit.target: Add an Azure blob destination to receive purchase order

trans-unit.source: This topic provides instructions on how to add an <token>azure_2</token> blob to the <token>af_integration</token> project.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides instructions on how to add an <token>azure_2</token> blob to the <token>af_integration</token> project.

trans-unit.source: After the <embeddedLabel>PurchaseOrderBridge</embeddedLabel> processes the customer order message, it routes the message to a <token>azure_2</token> blob.
trans-unit.target: After the <embeddedLabel>PurchaseOrderBridge</embeddedLabel> processes the customer order message, it routes the message to a <token>azure_2</token> blob.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>ConnectedCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> project, from the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, drag and drop the <embeddedLabel>Azure Blobs</embeddedLabel> component to the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design surface.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>ConnectedCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> project, from the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, drag and drop the <embeddedLabel>Azure Blobs</embeddedLabel> component to the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design surface.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the component, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, and enter the following values:
trans-unit.target: Right-click the component, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, and enter the following values:

trans-unit.source: Enter a unique and descriptive name of the Azure blob destination component.
trans-unit.target: Enter a unique and descriptive name of the Azure blob destination component.

trans-unit.source: For this tutorial, enter this as <embeddedLabel>PO_Blob</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: For this tutorial, enter this as <embeddedLabel>PO_Blob</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Enter the shared access signature URL for the container in Azure Blob storage where the messages are routed to.
trans-unit.target: Enter the shared access signature URL for the container in Azure Blob storage where the messages are routed to.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to generate the SAS, see <externalLink><linkText>Create and Use a Shared Access Signature</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj721951.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to generate the SAS, see <externalLink><linkText>Create and Use a Shared Access Signature</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj721951.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Azure Storage Explorer to generate SAS.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the Azure Storage Explorer to generate SAS.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Azure Storage Explorer, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Storage Explorer</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=282292</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the Azure Storage Explorer, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Storage Explorer</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=282292</linkUri></externalLink>.
